MAKTK.IS.summary: Makina Takim EndÃ¼strisi A.S. manufactures and sells cutting tools in Turkey. Its products include twist drills, taps, dies, thread chasers, reamers, countersinks, milling cutters, tool bits, and saws, as well as solid carbide drills, end mills, and reamers. The company also manufactures specially designed products for automotive, defense, machine and white appliances, and other industrial customers. It also exports its products. Makina Takim EndÃ¼strisi A.S. was founded in 1957 and is based in Gebze, Turkey.
